select u.handle, e.address as email_address
  from gcj05_oltp:user u, gcj05_oltp:email e
 where u.user_id = e.user_id
  and e.primary_ind = 1
  and u.status = 'A'
   and e.address in (
select address from gcj05_oltp:email where user_id in 
(15494833,15653122,15580515,15683994,15683995,15499417,15564419,15628849,15673192,15685956,15665828,
15548303,15609039,15625686,15567241,15491315,15620169,15629651,15688714,15546319,15683433,15486842,
15489251,15684881, 15684882, 15684949, 15601823, 15679840,15579015,15677550,15684743,15684745,15628637,
15566358,15657526, 15629133,15505698, 15536929, 15649698,15667964,15634914,15644123,15566359,15642152,
15579382,15547336,15503799,15650923,15668602,15679890,15671655,15488458,15599146,15601291,15599688,
15489281,15488015,15667877,15487563,15508190,15677913,15677914,15492882,15572758,15685628,15519089,
15626458,15604694,15679610,15529991, 15558594,15526524,15488521,15518659,15679553,15537560,15533178,
15628297,15620341,15495264,15504933,15644319,15603832,15635292,15492520,15677629,15500216,15491776,
15510031,15620975,15629123,15553377,15558897,15642300,15535894,15644985,15645101,15645109,15658527,
15614259,15684879,15684890,15550759,15641167,15629039,15493402,15519090,15570755,15553807,15686910,
15527636,15646168,15524973,15565370,15499367,15622558,15493529,15568215,15630609,15561166,15652642,
15571968,15503791,15504466,15513722,15644803,15532830,15532838,15646787,15559314,15518176,
15690260,15690261,15690262,15689976,15689980))
